verbose_text: However, these problems may be overcome by the introduction of human coagulation-regulatory genes, such as thrombomodulin and tissue factor pathway inhibitor (TFPI), or human anti-inflammatory genes, such as hemeoxygenase-1 and CD39 and/or tumor necrosis factor-alpha induced protein 3 (TNFAIP3; A20), respectively.
evidence: thrombomodulin and tissue factor pathway inhibitor (TFPI)                         , or human anti-inflammatory genes, such as hemeoxygenase-1 and CD39                              and/or tumor necrosis factor-alpha induced protein 3
